slide.title: Querying: matching array elements ($elemMatch)
slide.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo;
$c = $m->demo->circus;
$r = $c->find(
    array (
        'elephpants' =>
        array( '$elemMatch' => array ( 'colour' => 'blue', 'year' => array( '$gt' => 1900 ) )
    )
) );
foreach( $r as $c ) {
    echo $c['name'], ': ';
    foreach( $c['elephpants'] as $elephpant ) {
        echo "\n- ", join( ", ", $elephpant );
    }
    echo "\n\n";
}
?>
